subject: Experiment 20100710
author: rasterer
full_text:
I have placed a little something on top of my computer monitor, right in front of me.  It is now 7/10/2010.  I will leave it there 4 days, and remove it Noon Denver time, on Wednesday, 7/14/2010.

All you have to do is ask your boxes/spirits/aliens/etc, what it is.

I have taken a picture of it, and posted it to the files section here, so there is no way I can squirm out of the results:

http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/RJ/RJ.20100710.1.zip

Please do not try to open the file before noon Wednesday.  But feel free to download it to your computer beforehand, so you can be sure I won't change it during, or after, the test.

Answers anyone reveals after noon Wednesday don't count. Partial answers (like just the color, or shape, or some emotion vibe) don't count.  Just tell me what it is.

Best of Luck. I hope for this to be a regularly occurring experiment, and I hope we all can learn from the results.
